Plex Media Server PlexMediaServer https://forums.plex.tv/t/plex-media-server/30447/last Plex Inc Entertainment https://github.com/ukdtom/Testrepo/blob/main/PlexMediaServer_80x80.gif?raw=true https://github.com/ukdtom/Testrepo/blob/main/PlexMediaServer_100x100.gif?raw=true https://github.com/ukdtom/Testrepo/blob/main/PlexQNAPScreenshot.png?raw=true Plex gives you one place to find and access all the media that matters to you. From personal media on your own server, to free and on-demand Movies & Shows, live TV, podcasts, and web shows, to streaming music, you can enjoy it all in one app, on any device. 4.3.0 PLEX_VERSION PLEX_PUBDATE Plex build team Plex Inc https://forums.plex.tv English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Czech, Dansk, Nederlands, Suomi, Français, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, Magyar, Italiano, 日本語, 한글, Norsk, Polski, Português, Român, Русский, Español, Svenska, ไทย, Turk dili
